Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute near State/63rd
ShortDescription: #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to flooding near State/63rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions.

  • Southbound buses will operate via State, 59th, Wells, Marquette, then resume their normal route on State.
  • Northbound buses will operate via State, Marquette, Wentworth, 59th, then resume their normal route on State.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to flooding near State/63rd.

Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Dearborn/Washington
ShortDescription: Northbound 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Monroe, State, and Washington: due to, street blockage near Dearborn/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Northbound #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Monroe, State, Washington and over regular route , due to street blockage near Dearborn/Washington.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
